description:
runtime: fix freebsd arm for hash change

Was missing definitions of open, read, close.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=72ef555d8765 ***

runtime: fix freebsd arm for hash change

Was missing definitions of open, read, close.

R=golang-dev
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7828043

Thank you. The freebsd/arm builder will probably get a lot further now.

On Fri, Mar 15, 2013 at 8:45 AM,  <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=72ef555d8765 ***
